summary: The Klipsch R-800F Speaker features an impressive frequency response range of 34Hz to 21kHz, ensuring excellent sound quality across low and high frequencies.
Equipped with a sensitivity rating of 98 dB (in-room), the speaker is designed to deliver high sound pressure levels, making it suitable for various audio environments.
Key components include dual 8" spun-copper woofers and a 1" aluminum LTS tweeter coupled with a 90 x 90 square Tractrix® Horn, enhancing both low-end and high-end audio performance.
The speaker is housed in a robust bass-reflex enclosure crafted from reinforced MDF, featuring rear-firing Tractrix® ports that aid in deep bass response.
Additional features include easy Dolby Atmos upgrade connections, making the R-800F an appealing choice for home theater enthusiasts.

attributes.high_frequency_driver: 1" Aluminum LTS tweeter mated to a 90 x 90 square Tractrix® Horn
attributes.refined_connections: Easy Dolby Atmos upgrade hidden connections
